mapper.sql: id, accoubt_avbalance, accoubt_frobalance, unreceive_principal, unreceive_interest, unreceive_money, credit_limit, remain_credit_limit, trade_password
mapper.select: select accoubt_avbalance from t_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and trade_password = #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_account (id, accoubt_avbalance, accoubt_frobalance, unreceive_principal, unreceive_interest, unreceive_money, credit_limit, remain_credit_limit, trade_password) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accoubtAvbalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accoubtFrobalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unreceivePrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unreceiveInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unreceiveMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainCreditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_account
id,
accoubt_avbalance,
accoubt_frobalance,
unreceive_principal,
unreceive_interest,
unreceive_money,

remain_credit_limit,

mapper.update:
update t_account
accoubt_avbalance = #{accoubtAvbalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
accoubt_frobalance = #{accoubtFrobalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unreceive_principal = #{unreceivePrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unreceive_interest = #{unreceiveInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unreceive_money = #{unreceiveMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

remain_credit_limit = #{remainCreditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_password = #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_account set accoubt_avbalance = #{accoubtAvbalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, accoubt_frobalance = #{accoubtFrobalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unreceive_principal = #{unreceivePrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unreceive_interest = #{unreceiveInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unreceive_money = #{unreceiveMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, credit_limit = #{creditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remain_credit_limit = #{remainCreditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trade_password = #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
